hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Whoever does not give up false statements (i.e. telling lies), and evil deeds, and speaking bad words to others, Allah is not in need of his (fasting) leaving his food and drink

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى {وَاجْتَنِبُوا قَوْلَ الزُّورِ}
